page.title: 14HOTELS
page.content: There are many hotels in the High Street,all catering for yachtsmen, businessmen and holiday makers.{The {Fountain Hotel,}now one of the few residential hotels in the town,was built 100 years ago. It has 20 rooms accommodating a maximum of 32 people. The property was originally bigger, having 23 rooms, and servants quarters and stables.Today all rooms are en-suite with T.V. & tea-makers.It costs Â£29.50 a night for a single room.The hotel is busiest in Cowes Week.It is situated at the entrance to a short covered arcade,with a few shops and the Red Funnel landing stage at the end.It has an ideal position in the High Street,as well as overlooking Cowes Harbour.
